types:type.name: postorder
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type postorder = {| poNumber: String, signatureRequiredFlag: Boolean, shipInstructions: String, giftWrapFlag: Boolean, giftWrapMessage: String, currencyCode: String, subTotal: Number {"typeId": "double"}, email: String |} {"example": "{\\\"poNumber\\\":\\\"123461\\\",\\\"signatureRequiredFlag\\\":false,\\\"shipInstructions\\\":\\\"Don't break it\\\",\\\"giftWrapFlag\\\":true,\\\"giftWrapMessage\\\":\\\"You rock!\\\",\\\"currencyCode\\\":\\\"USD\\\",\\\"subTotal\\\":41.5,\\\"email\\\":\\\"test@test.com\\\"}"}
